Title: The Scale of Affection Is Fluid
Writer: Jason Katims (developed by), Jesse Zwick, Lowell Ganz (based on the characters created by), Babaloo Mandel (based on the characters created by), Ron Howard (based on the characters created by)
Actors: Peter Krause, Lauren Graham, Dax Shepard, Monica Potter
Plot: Max (Max Burkholder) gathers intel on his new friend in search of common ground. Though Kristina (Monica Potter) fears he'll get his heart broken, he is more determined than ever to pursue ...
